channel.title: Official Minecraft Server - New feature [Chest and Furnace Protect]
channel.description:
It's very important that people get this message ASAP, so we can transition from an unprotected server, to one protected from theft. This thread will be removed when Lin adds it to the original post. (Or a moderator can edit the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471687.msg3449949.html#msg3449949]post[/url], and append this to the bottom)
Make sure to protect your chests now! [b]Also note that I can see who protects which chests, so if you protect a chest that isn't yours, you will be punished![/b]
How to protect a chest/furnace with a password:
[ol][li]Stand somewhere near your chest.[/li] [li]Press 't' to open the chat window then type: [pre]/cpassword 123[/pre] Replace 123 with a password of your choice.[/li] [li]Left click on the chest/furnace you want to protect.[/li][/ol]
This allows you to give that password to certain people, for a shared chest.
How to protect a chest/furnace so only you can use it:
[ol][li]Stand somewhere near your chest.[/li] [li]Press 't' to open the chat window then type: [pre]/cprivate[/pre][/li] [li]Left click on the chest/furnace you want to protect.[/li][/ol]
This means only you can access this chest.
How to protect a chest/furnace so everyone can use it:
[ol][li]Stand somewhere near your chest.[/li] [li]Press 't' to open the chat window then type: [pre]/cpublic[/pre][/li] [li]Left click on the chest/furnace you want to protect.[/li][/ol]
This means that you own the chest, but everyone can access it.

item.title: Official Minecraft Server - New feature [Chest and Furnace Protect]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I’d recommend looking into my “region” or player-owned property idea. This way, nobody can build or destroy what’s inside a certain region. A player could only have one region at once, and it would have to be pretty small, unless approved by an administrator. When constructing one, it would have to be a certain distance away from the spawn point and from all other property.

To make things even more secure, properties would have to always get approved by an administrator.

Read full topic
item.source: Official Minecraft Server - New feature [Chest and Furnace Protect]

item.title: Official Minecraft Server - New feature [Chest and Furnace Protect]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:30, topic:376524”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=472447.msg3456026#msg3456026 date=1294032472]

“Also note that I can see who protects which chests, so if you protect a chest that isn’t yours, you will be punished!”

It shows you, but make it so that people can’t protect things that aren’t theirs, not just send it to you so that you can ban someone 5 hours after it happens…
[/quote]That would mean that every single block had ownership rights, which they don’t. If they did, I could easily remove greifing as well.

Yeah but if you added ownership rights to every block, griefers would just fill a house with dirt, and nobody could destroy it.[/quote]you got a point there

Read full topic
